original: Nasaraṇaṁ naāsavañceva naanāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca.
analyzed: na saraṇam na āsavañca iva na anāsavañca dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā pañca ārammaṇe dve pe vipāke ekam pe avigate pañca
translated: The Chapter on the Pairs of the Pairs of Threads🔽The Chapter on

original: Nasaraṇaṁ naanāsavañceva nano ca āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ….
analyzed: na saraṇam na anāsavam ca iva na no ca āsavam dhammam paṭicca
translated: Dependent on a non-perilous, not subject to cankers, and a subject to cankers …🔽Dependent on a non-perilous, not subject to cankers, and not associated with cankers …

original: Nasaraṇaṁ naāsavañceva naāsavavippayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nasaraṇaṁ naāsavavippayuttañceva nano ca āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ….🔽Nasaraṇaṁ naāsavavippayuttaṁ nasāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ….
analyzed: na saraṇam na āsavam ca iva na āsava vippayuttam ca dhammam paṭicca pe na saraṇam na āsava vippayuttam ca iva na no ca āsavam dhammam paṭicca  na saraṇam na āsava vippayuttam na sa āsavam dhammam paṭicca
translated: Dependent on a non-perilous, not subject to cankers, and not associated with cankers …

original: Nasaraṇaṁ naāsavavippayuttaṁ naanāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na saraṇam na āsava vippayuttam na anāsavam dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi ārammaṇe ekam pe avigate tīṇi
translated: Dependent on a non-perilous, not subject to cankers, and not subject to cankers … (In brief.) In the section on root cause, there are three; in the section on object, there is one; … In the section on non-distortion, there are three.
